reviewText: Only a 45 minute sketch, but intriguing ideas for people with an open mind. Interviews with some out of the box thinkers, but basically just an outline for you to use for  "Being in the NOW"

This is an excellent piece that explains, in plain language, the connection between the mind and the body.  In simple and understandable terms, with an interesting and varied set of experts explaining how, it leaves the viewer with a clear understanding of how our thoughts translate into actions and results.  It gave me the means to make transformative changes in my own life after learning what I did from the film.
A great learning and growing tool.
Great insight, and widsom on a wild subject
Loved it.  Exactly what I needed to hear.
